trans-unit.target: 通常使用 typeof 运算符 (C#) 或 GetType 运算符 (Visual Basic) 来指定此参数，以检索正在注册脚本的控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the script statement.
trans-unit.target: 脚本语句的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The script to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Registers ECMAScript (JavaScript) code with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for a control that is used with an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control that is executed when the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: 针对与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控件一起使用的控件，向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件注册提交表单时执行的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代码。

trans-unit.source: Registering JavaScript code with this method causes the script to be included every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法注册 JavaScript 代码将导致脚本要包含每次发生异步回发。

trans-unit.source: Code from any earlier asynchronous postbacks is not removed.
trans-unit.target: 从任何早期异步回发的代码不会删除。

trans-unit.source: New asynchronous postbacks append code to any existing code for the `onsubmit` statement.
trans-unit.target: 新的异步回发将代码附加到任何现有代码，以`onsubmit`语句。

trans-unit.source: To register code for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that the code is registered only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 可以注册在控件内的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，以便注册该代码时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件更新，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>此方法的重载。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要注册不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册该代码仅一次初始页呈现期间使用的 JavaScript 代码<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>页属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="page" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="page" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control to register for postback.
trans-unit.target: 要为回发注册的控件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for a postback.
trans-unit.target: 将控件注册为回发的触发器。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to configure postback controls inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于配置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控件内的回发控件，若未配置，此控件将执行异步回发。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A> method to register postback controls inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as triggers.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>方法注册内的回发控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>为触发器的控件。

trans-unit.source: Controls that are registered by using this method update a whole page instead of updating only the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control's content.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法注册的控件更新整个页面，而不是仅更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Registering a postback control with this method outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control has no affect because by default these controls do not perform asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 使用外部此方法注册的回发控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件具有没有影响，因为默认情况下这些控件不执行异步回发。

trans-unit.source: You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将添加触发器以声明方式`Triggers`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，使用设计器的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl" /> 接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: The script control to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的脚本控件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a script control with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 向当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 实例注册脚本控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily for use by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要适用于由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A> method from a custom ASP.NET Ajax script control during its `onInit` event handler to register that control with the page.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A>方法期间，从自定义 ASP.NET Ajax 脚本控件其`onInit`事件处理程序以注册该控件使用页。

trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET Ajax script control must be registered to participate in partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 参与局部页面呈现，必须注册 ASP.NET Ajax 脚本控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A> method adds the specified extender control to an internal list of script controls that is processed during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A>方法将指定的扩展程序控件添加到期间处理的脚本控件的内部列表<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scriptControl" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scriptControl" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control to call back to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> classes in order to return scripts that support the client object that represents a client control, component, or behavior.
trans-unit.target: 指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件回调到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> 类，以便返回支持表示客户端控件、组件或行为的客户端对象的脚本。

trans-unit.source: The extender control for which script descriptors will be registered.
trans-unit.target: 将为其注册脚本描述符的扩展程序控件。

trans-unit.source: Calls back to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> class to return instance scripts that must be rendered to support the client object that represents a client control, component, or behavior.
trans-unit.target: 回调到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> 类以返回为支持表示客户端控件、组件或行为的客户端对象而必须呈现的实例脚本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors%2A> method in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>类调用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors%2A>方法在其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> class and override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method, but you do not call the base class method, you must call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors(System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" />类并重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法，但你不调用基类方法，必须调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors(System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control to render the instance scripts that support the client object that the control represents.
trans-unit.target: 这使<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />控件呈现支持该控件所表示的客户端对象的实例脚本。

trans-unit.source: The script control for which script descriptors will be registered.
trans-unit.target: 将为其注册脚本描述符的脚本控件。

trans-unit.source: Calls a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" /> class to return instance scripts that must be rendered to support the client object that represents a client control, component, or behavior.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" /> 类以返回为支持表示客户端控件、组件或行为的客户端对象而必须呈现的实例脚本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors%2A> method during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl>类调用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors%2A>方法在其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" /> class and override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method, but you do not call the base class method, you must call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors(System.Web.UI.IScriptControl)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl" />类并重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法，但你不调用基类方法，必须调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptDescriptors(System.Web.UI.IScriptControl)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control to render the instance scripts that support the client object that the control represents.
trans-unit.target: 这使<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />控件呈现支持该控件所表示的客户端对象的实例脚本。

trans-unit.source: Registers a startup script block with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control and adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件注册一个启动脚本块并将此脚本块添加到页面中。

trans-unit.source: The control that is registering the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 正在注册客户端脚本块的控件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本块的类型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is usually specified by using the typeof operator (C#) or the GetType operator (Visual Basic) to retrieve the type of the control that is registering the script.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用 typeof 运算符 (C#) 或 GetType 运算符 (Visual Basic) 来指定此参数，以检索正在注册脚本的控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the script block.
trans-unit.target: 脚本块的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The script to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的脚本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enclose the script block with <see langword="<script>" /> and <see langword="</script>" /> tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用 <see langword="<script>" /> 和 <see langword="</script>" /> 标记括起此脚本块，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a startup script block for a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> by using the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control, and adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 中的某个控件注册一个启动脚本块，并将此脚本块添加到页面中。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method to register a startup script block for a page that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法注册一个启动脚本块与局部页面呈现，兼容的页面未包含任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Startup script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the control that is registering the block is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法注册的启动脚本块发送到页面中，仅当正在注册块控件内<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>正在更新的控件。

trans-unit.source: To register a startup script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要注册一个启动脚本块每次异步回发发生时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>此方法的重载。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a startup script that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要注册的启动脚本的不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册脚本仅一次初始页呈现期间使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>页属性。

trans-unit.source: The script block that is rendered by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method executes when the page finishes loading but before the page's client `onload` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 由呈现的脚本块<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法执行时在页面完成加载，但在该页面的客户端之前`onload`引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Startup script blocks are located at the bottom of the rendered ASP.NET page just before the `</form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 启动脚本块位于呈现的 ASP.NET 页的底部紧前面`</form>`标记。

trans-unit.source: Startup script blocks that are registered by using <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用已注册的启动脚本块<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>并非一定要与它们注册的顺序相同的输出。

trans-unit.source: If the order of the startup script blocks is important, use a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object to gather the script blocks in a single string, and then register them all as a single startup script.
trans-unit.target: 如果启动脚本块的顺序很重要，则使用<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>对象，以便收集的脚本块中单个字符串中，然后将它们注册所有作为单个启动脚本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not in the page's control tree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 不在该页面的控件树中。

trans-unit.source: The page object that is registering the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 正在注册客户端脚本块的页对象。

trans-unit.source: The type of the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本块的类型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is usually specified by using the typeof operator (C#) or the GetType operator (Visual Basic) to retrieve the type of the control that is registering the script.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用 typeof 运算符 (C#) 或 GetType 运算符 (Visual Basic) 来指定此参数，以检索正在注册脚本的控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the script block.
trans-unit.target: 脚本块的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The script to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的脚本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enclose the script block with <see langword="<script>" /> and <see langword="</script>" /> tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用 <see langword="<script>" /> 和 <see langword="</script>" /> 标记括起此脚本块，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a startup script block for every asynchronous postback with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control and adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 为每个异步回发向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件注册一个启动脚本块，并将此脚本块添加到页面中。

trans-unit.source: You use this method to register a startup script block that is included every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以注册一个启动脚本块，它包括在每次发生异步回发。

trans-unit.source: To register a script block for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that the script block is registered only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要注册脚本块内的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，以便注册该脚本块时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件更新，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>此方法的重载。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a startup script that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要注册的启动脚本的不属于部分页面更新，如果你想要注册脚本仅一次初始页呈现期间使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>页属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that receives the content of the control to write to the page.
trans-unit.target: 一个接收要写入页面的控件内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control's content to the browser by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件的内容呈现给浏览器。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由控件开发人员用来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, call the base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method so that the client script that defines the class is rendered on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在重写此方法，调用基<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />方法，以便在页面上呈现定义类的客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a composite script is registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件注册复合脚本时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a member of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts" /> collection is registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件注册 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts" /> 集合的成员时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised one time for each member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件是一次的每个成员<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>在页面的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform any updates before the script is rendered to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件脚本呈现到页之前执行的任何更新。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> object for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the role service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册角色服务。

trans-unit.source: The role service can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以在中定义的角色服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件或关联<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET role service or use a custom role service.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ASP.NET 角色服务或使用自定义的角色服务。

trans-unit.source: You can add the custom service in markup by including a `RoleService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 你可以在标记中添加自定义的服务，通过包括`RoleService`内的元素`asp:ScriptManager`元素在页面上，如下面的示例中所示：

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式配置<xref:System.Web.UI.RoleServiceManager>对象。

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 注册服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件在页面的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命周期阶段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether debug or release versions of client script libraries are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是呈现客户端脚本库的调试版本还是发布版本。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that indicates the current mode.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前模式的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property specifies whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control should render debug or release versions of client script libraries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件应呈现调试或发布的客户端脚本库的版本。

trans-unit.source: This value can be superseded by values that are set in the configuration file and in the page directive.
trans-unit.target: 此值可以通过在配置文件中并在页面指令中设置的值被取代。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了此属性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Value
Definition
trans-unit.target: 定义

trans-unit.source: Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page when the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本库用于在网页上的调试版本时`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the release versions of client script libraries are used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，使用客户端脚本库的发行版本。

trans-unit.source: When applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object, this value is the same as <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>对象，此值等同于<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>。

trans-unit.source: Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调试版本的客户端脚本库使用网页中，除非`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Release versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本库的发行版本使用网页中，除非`retail`配置元素的属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: `debug`指令的特性不会影响支持 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> properties to determine whether to render debug scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件使用的设置仅在 Web.config 文件中并在其<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>属性来确定是否呈现调试脚本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[调试和跟踪 Ajax 应用程序概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode" /> property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode" /> 属性不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode" /> 值中的其中一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root path of the location that is used to build the paths to ASP.NET Ajax and custom script files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置的根路径，该位置用来生成指向 ASP.NET Ajax 和自定义脚本文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The location where script files are stored.
trans-unit.target: 存储脚本文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which is interpreted as a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为解释为相对路径的空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> property enables you to specify an absolute, relative, or application-relative URL for all script blocks on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>属性使您能够指定绝对、 相对的或在页面上阻止所有脚本的相对于应用程序 URL。

trans-unit.source: This includes custom and third-party script blocks that are registered with the current <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这包括与当前注册的自定义和第三方脚本块<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> property is typically set declaratively as an attribute of a `ScriptManager` element on the page, but it can be set in code also.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>属性通常以声明方式的属性设置`ScriptManager`元素上的页中，但它可以还在代码中设置。

trans-unit.source: If the `path` attribute or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is set for a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection, the path value overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> value for that <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>集合，则路径值将覆盖<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>值的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>实例。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> value is specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control searches the directory that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> property and resolves script references by their <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>指定值，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件搜索由定义的目录<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>属性并解析脚本引用其<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping> object that can contain a collection of mappings that represent the location of the script resource (script redirection).
trans-unit.target: 静态<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping>可以包含表示脚本资源 （脚本重定向） 的位置的映射的集合对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection of mappings can be mapped based on names or name/assembly pairs, and it can point to a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据名称或名称/程序集对映射的映射此集合，它可以指向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following examples shows how to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition> object that can be referenced by a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition>可供引用的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>对象。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the Global.asax file in the `Application_Start` event.
trans-unit.target: 将以下代码添加到 Global.asax 文件`Application_Start`事件。

trans-unit.source: In the markup for an ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx file), add the following markup inside the `form` element and before any elements or code that uses jQuery script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面 （.aspx 文件） 的标记，添加以下标记内的`form`元素并且在任何元素或使用 jQuery 脚本的代码之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> objects, each of which represents a script file rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 对象（每个对象表示一个呈现给客户端的脚本文件）的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection" /> object of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection> object that is returned by this property is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects, each of which represents a script file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection>此属性返回的对象是一个集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>对象，其中每个表示一个脚本文件。

trans-unit.source: The collection includes references to all the script files that ASP.NET needs for Ajax functionality, and to custom script files.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含针对 Ajax 功能，则 ASP.NET 需要的所有脚本文件和自定义脚本文件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Custom script files to render can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以在定义自定义脚本文件来呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件或关联<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add script files to the collection in markup by adding `asp:ScriptReference` elements to a `Scripts` node inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过添加脚本文件添加到标记中的集合`asp:ScriptReference`元素与`Scripts`节点`asp:ScriptManager`元素在页面上，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also add a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection programmatically by using the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>以编程方式通过使用集合<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control registers script files during the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件在控件的过程注册脚本文件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection does not contain the core [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>集合不包含核心[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]脚本。

trans-unit.source: The scripts in the core library are rendered automatically; they do not have to be registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 核心库中的脚本可以呈现自动保存功能。它们无需向注册<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to override a core script or any control script and substitute a different version of the script, you can add your version to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要重写核心脚本或任何控制脚本并替换该脚本的不同版本，则可以添加到你的版本<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection" /> object that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference" /> object for each Web service that ASP.NET exposes on the client for Ajax functionality.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection" /> 对象，该对象包含 ASP.NET 在客户端上针对 Ajax 功能公开的每个 Web 服务的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection" /> object for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection> object that is returned by this property is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> objects, each of which represents a Web service that is registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection>此属性返回的对象是一个集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>对象，其中每个表示 Web 服务向注册<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can define services in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以定义中的服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件或关联<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add services to the collection in markup by adding an `asp:ServiceReference` element to a `Services` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` instance on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加到标记中的集合中添加服务`asp:ServiceReference`元素`Services`内的元素`asp:ScriptManager`实例在页上，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection by using the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>使用进行收集<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 注册服务<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>在页面的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命周期阶段。

trans-unit.source: Sets the browser focus to the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器焦点设置为指定控件。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the control to receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 要接收焦点的控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Sets the browser focus to the control specified by ID.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器焦点设置为由 ID 指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method works like the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法的工作原理类似<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类。

trans-unit.source: Both methods make the control with the specified ID the active control on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法使具有指定 ID 控件在网页上的活动控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class is used to set focus during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>类用于将焦点设置异步回发期间。

trans-unit.source: During postbacks and when the page is first rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: 在回发和首次呈现页时，期间<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method, the control in the last call receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个调用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法，最后一次调用中的控件接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: The control to receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 要接收焦点的控件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the browser focus to the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器焦点设置为指定控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method works like the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法的工作原理类似<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类。

trans-unit.source: Both methods make the specified control the active control on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法使指定的控件在网页上的活动控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class is used to set focus during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>类用于将焦点设置异步回发期间。

trans-unit.source: During postbacks and when the page is first rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: 在回发和首次呈现页时，期间<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A> method, the control specified in the last call receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个调用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SetFocus%2A>方法，在最后一次调用中指定的控件接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client supports partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示客户端是否支持局部页面呈现的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client supports partial-page rendering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端支持局部页面呈现，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default check to determine whether partial-page rendering is supported returns `true` when the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否支持局部页面呈现的默认检查返回`true`当以下条件都为真：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A> property value must be greater than or equal to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A>属性值必须大于或等于 1.0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A> property value must be greater than or equal to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>属性值必须大于或等于 1.0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property value must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>属性值必须设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property is explicitly set, these checks are not used.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>属性显式设置，则不使用这些检查。

trans-unit.source: Control developers should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property to determine whether they should support partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员应使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>属性来确定他们是否应支持局部页面呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering" /> property is <see langword="false" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />，而 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering" /> 属性原来设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering" /> property was set after the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 发生 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件之后设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The key-identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all incoming post data.
trans-unit.target: 所有传入的后期数据的集合。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件的状态已因回发而更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: A string of key/value pairs that represent the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 表示网页历史记录状态的键/值对的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control to process a postback event and load the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 启用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件以处理回发事件，并加载网页的历史记录状态。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> property that is inherited from the base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> class to prevent setting this value.
trans-unit.target: 重写从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 基类继承的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> 属性以防止设置此值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is overridden in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class to prevent setting this value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性被重写，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>类以防止设置此值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotImplementedException> error occurs if a value is assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotImplementedException>如果一个值分配给此属性，则会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: A value is assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 将一个值分配给 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Visible" /> 属性。
